entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Hi all!

I'm Michael Peyton Jones, and this is my blog. I'm planning to use it for a variety of stuff, but I'm also going to be using it as a way to keep people up to date with what I'm doing in Australia. If that's you, then you can get a feed that will just get you those posts by clicking this link.
